description: Students encounter the history and development of Western European music from the Middle Ages to ca. 1750 and study the genres and styles of music from monophonic chant to concerted music of the Baroque. Prerequisite: Music 114. Offered annually in the Fall Semester.
name: Hist & Lit Music I
prerequisites: Music 114. Offered annually in the Fall Semester.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: Music 114. Offered annually in the Fall Semester.

title: History and Literature of Music I
